name: Theme Based Product Roadmap
description:
A theme-based product roadmap template. A roadmap is not a promise, this should be a living part of your product strategy.


I generally use this to visualize any amount of complexity. It reminds us to start at a high level, and circle in on the details, without getting caught up in the weeds.


I would recommend keeping it high level here, and getting more detailed in your backlog once you have your milestones identified. Focus on the outcomes, rather than outputs.


Every project is unique, you'll most like have to make changes to fit your project.


Have fun!
